name: Static (itch) (cshipes)
description:
HUGE EPILEPSY WARNING

In  Static, your goal is to escape from the room that you have found yourself in by solving various puzzles that appear as the room's lighting moves around.

*NOTE: On the arrow puzzle, there is a hidden purple arrow in the corner across from the other arrows. This did not display correctly outside of Unreal Engine, and I could not figure out for the life of me why it was not displaying correctly.*
